metadata.title: CVE-2021-41798 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: MediaWiki before 1.36.2 allows XSS. Month related MediaWiki messages arenot escaped before being used on the Special:Search results page.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
